pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static, scenic aerial shot of a majestic, snow-covered mountain peak. The peak is covered with snow-dusted evergreen trees, and it rises above a sea of thick, white clouds. In the far distance, another range of snow-capped mountains is visible under a clear, light-blue sky.
